function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Social distancing measures not being followed","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion spread","Mitigation":"Public education and enforcement of social distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Surveillance technology to monitor social distancing compliance","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of compliance with stay-at-home orders","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion spread","Mitigation":"Clear communication of essential activities, financial support for those unable to stay at home","Technologies":"Remote work technology, contact tracing apps","People":"General public","Owner":"Government and employers"}]}
